ygData.subject: Again where and where ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, i am near level 16 now (very close in fact) and i need to buy some spell. I am in freeport now and i have done all the merchant to try to find some
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
i am near level 16 now (very close in fact) and i need to buy some spell. I
am in freeport now and i have done all the merchant to try to find some
spel.. At the wizzard guild, there is only let s say 10 wizzard spel and
early one :( Anyone knows if there is a secret house or something like that
who is selling attack spel for level 16 ? and does someone knows how to open
the door located under water in the magical hall in freeport ???

thanks for all

yakos

level 15 3/4 wizzard :)

p.s. ho and yes any good information about research would be appreciated too
:) We all know we need rune to make scrol : we must buy a book , then put in
this book the rune for the spel then hit combine : yeah but can we miss ???
if yes it is going to be real hard for us !!! Rune are sold about 5 pp
!!!!!!
